text: This is a list of LSU Tigers basketball team seasons and history from their first season in 1908–09 to present. ==History== {| width=60% class="toccolours" !colspan=2 bgcolor=461D7C|LSU Tigers basketball |- |First season|| 1908–09 |- !colspan=2 bgcolor=461D7C|SEC History |- |Conference Regular Season Championships|| 11 (1935, 1953, 1954, 1979, 1981, 1985, 1991, 2000, 2006, 2009, 2019) |-bgcolor=#eeeeee |Conference Tournament Championships|| 1 (1980) |-bgcolor=#eeeeee |- !colspan=2 bgcolor=461D7C|NCAA Tournament History |- |NCAA Appearances|| 22 (1953, 1954, 1979, 1980, 1981, 1984, 1985, 1986, 1987, 1988, 1989, 1990, 1991, 1992, 1993, 2000, 2003, 2005, 2006, 2009, 2015, 2019) |-bgcolor=#eeeeee |Sweet Sixteen|| 10 (1953, 1954, 1979, 1980, 1981, 1986, 1987, 2000, 2006, 2019) |- |Elite Eight|| 6 (1953, 1980, 1981, 1986, 1987, 2006) |-bgcolor=#eeeeee |Final Four|| 4 (1953, 1981, 1986, 2006) |- !colspan=2 bgcolor=461D7C|National Championships |- |National Championships|| 1 (1935) *LSU claims a national championship for the 1934–35 season, however, no major organization has named them national champions for the season |- |colspan=2|Accurate as of the end of the 2018-19 season |} Sources: ==Season-by-season results== The following is a list of LSU Tigers basketball seasons with records and notable accomplishments. Sources: ===Notes=== ==References== Category:Lists of college basketball seasons in the United States
title: List of LSU Tigers basketball seasons
